extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Mejora tu experiencia de navegación en Safari bloqueando anuncios, rastreadores y otros contenidos no deseados.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

status_enabled.description: Shown in the popup when the extension is active.

status_inactive.description: Shown in the popup when the extension appears to be inactive.

open_app.description: Text on the button that opens the main app.
